Package uoc.dpoo.classifier.bayes

Class AbstractNaiveBayesClassifierMapImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • uoc.dpoo.classifier.bayes.AbstractNaiveBayesImpl

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    INaiveBayesClassifier
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NaiveBayesClassifierMapImpl
    public abstract class AbstractNaiveBayesClassifierMapImpl
extends AbstractNaiveBayesClassifierImpl
    A simple, scalable Naive Bayes Classifier, based on a key-value store (in memory using ConcurrentHashMap, or disk-based using org.mapdb.HTreeMap)
